item.description:
Joe Tecce's (http://joetecces.com/) has a large patio in front of the restaurant. So let's dine al fresco on a lazy Saturday afternoon. If the weather doesn't cooperate, we'll dine indoors. Tecce's is one of the North End's most traditional restuarants and has been in their family for over 60 years. All portions are large and prices are very reasonable.

Pizza $9.95-11.25, Panini $6.95-9.95, Antipasti $5.95-10.95, Insalate $3.95-7.95, Specialties $9.95-13.95, Pasta $9.95-12.95, Entrees $11.95-14.95.

Either North Station or Haymarket on the T will provide a 5-minute walk to the restaurant. And parking is best at the Parcel 7 Garage. (http://local.yahoo.com/info-10155289-parcel-7-parking-garage-boston) The entrance is on Sudbury Street. Please bring cash, as we will not get separate checks. Hope you can join us.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the bar from 12:00-1:00
item.name: Joe Tecce's Ristorante-Lunch al Fresco
